summaryBody: Chanel trained at NYU Tisch and honed her craft across stage, film, and immersive art spaces. Her work lives where raw humanity meets editorial edge.

story.headline: Story
story.paragraph: A former dancer with deep jazz roots, Chanel brings rhythm to every role. Her process blends method prep with improvisational play, keeping performances alive and electric.
bullets: Height: 5'7" • Eyes: Hazel • Hair: Natural curls
Special skills: Contemporary dance, vocal looping
